# datapower_stylepolicyrule (Data Source)

Processing Rule

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_stylepolicyrule" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_stylepolicyrule.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```

Optional:
